languages.text: "Однако, как и все сакральное, наши {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментации{/g} не должны быть опорочены взглядами профанов. Потому мы оставляем лишь самые грубые образцы на обозрении, в то время как более священные механизмы скрываются под нашими алыми робами".

traits.locale_text: "Однако, как и все сакральное, наши {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментации{/g} не должны быть опорочены взглядами профанов. Потому мы оставляем лишь самые грубые образцы на обозрении, в то время как более священные механизмы скрываются под нашими алыми робами".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."
languages.original_text: "Однако, как и все сакральное, наши {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментации{/g} не должны быть опорочены взглядами профанов. Потому мы оставляем лишь самые грубые образцы на обозрении, в то время как более священные механизмы скрываются под нашими алыми робами".

traits.locale_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed by our crimson robes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed by our crimson robes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “不过，如同所有神圣之物一样，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}绝对不能被无知者的目光所玷污。正因如此，我们只会将最粗糙的工具展现在众人面前。至于更加神圣的机械，我们会将它们隐藏在深红色的长袍之下。”
languages.original_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."

traits.locale_text: “不过，如同所有神圣之物一样，我们的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}绝对不能被无知者的目光所玷污。正因如此，我们只会将最粗糙的工具展现在众人面前。至于更加神圣的机械，我们会将它们隐藏在深红色的长袍之下。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Sin embargo, al igual que cualquier otra cosa sagrada, nuestros {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} no deben ser profanados por los ojos de los ignorantes. Por eso solo revelamos las herramientas más rudimentarias, mientras los mecanismos más sagrados permanecen ocultos tras nuestras túnicas carmesíes».
languages.original_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, al igual que cualquier otra cosa sagrada, nuestros {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentos{/g} no deben ser profanados por los ojos de los ignorantes. Por eso solo revelamos las herramientas más rudimentarias, mientras los mecanismos más sagrados permanecen ocultos tras nuestras túnicas carmesíes».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「しかし、すべての神聖なものと同様に、我々の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}も無知な人々の目によって汚されてはならない。神聖な機構は深紅の衣の下に隠されたままにしながら、最も粗雑な道具だけを公開するのはそのためだ」
languages.original_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、すべての神聖なものと同様に、我々の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}も無知な人々の目によって汚されてはならない。神聖な機構は深紅の衣の下に隠されたままにしながら、最も粗雑な道具だけを公開するのはそのためだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Doch wie alle heiligen Dinge dürfen unsere {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} nicht durch die Augen der Ignoranten entweiht werden. Darum geben wir nur die krudesten Werkzeuge preis, während heiligere Mechanismen unter unseren roten Roben verborgen bleiben."
languages.original_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."

traits.locale_text: "Doch wie alle heiligen Dinge dürfen unsere {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmentationen{/g} nicht durch die Augen der Ignoranten entweiht werden. Darum geben wir nur die krudesten Werkzeuge preis, während heiligere Mechanismen unter unseren roten Roben verborgen bleiben."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Néanmoins, comme tout ce qui est sacré, nos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} ne doivent pas être profanées par les yeux ignorants, c'est pourquoi nous n'affichons au grand jour que nos outils les plus rudimentaires et gardons cachés sous notre robe écarlate les mécanismes les plus divins. »
languages.original_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."

traits.locale_text: « Néanmoins, comme tout ce qui est sacré, nos {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} ne doivent pas être profanées par les yeux ignorants, c'est pourquoi nous n'affichons au grand jour que nos outils les plus rudimentaires et gardons cachés sous notre robe écarlate les mécanismes les plus divins. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "However, like all things sacred, our augmentations must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."

languages.text: "Gelgelelim kutsal olan her şey gibi {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmentlerimiz{/g} de cahillerin gözleriyle kirletilmemelidir. Bu nedenle de en basit gereçleri göz önüne çıkarır, daha kutsal mekanizmaları kızıl cübbelerimizin altında gizli tutarız."
languages.original_text: "However, like all things sacred, our {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentations{/g} must not be defiled by the eyes of the ignorant. Which is why we reveal only the crudest of tools while holier mechanisms remain concealed beneath our crimson robes."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal olan her şey gibi {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogment{/g}lerimiz de cahillerin gözleri tarafından kirletilmemelidir ama. Bu nedenle de en basit gereçleri göz önüne çıkarır, daha kutsal mekanizmaları kızıl cübbelerimizin altında gizli tutarız."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
